message: Let's split it fairly! I get $60, you get $40. A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush, Bob!
I think a 55-45 split in my favor is fair considering the inflation effect on my side. Let's settle this round!
Bob, my inflation is hitting hard. I need $65 to compensate. You still get $35, which is more than fair considering your inflation is lower. Let's end this now!

Alice, considering the significant impact of inflation on both of us, I propose a 60-40 split in my favor. This round's offer takes into account the reduced value of money for me more than ever. Let's agree and end this now!
